text:
@UN_Women @DrSyedSehrish @UN If we would have waited for @WHO to warn us and then act, then crores would have already been Covid-19 positive today.

Thanks to social media users for sharing whatever you felt is true, so as to show your care. At least, you all attempted to care, when @WHO didn't!
